variants.body:
Hey {{first_name}},

Just like {{company_name}}, we help many more in the {{industry}} industry get more commercial customers automatically.Â 

While everybody competes for solar projects with good commercial clients, like industrial parks, warehouses, logistics centers, hotels, EV chargingâ€¦

It requires more and more time and effort to get new appointments with quality leads .

We can solve this issue and fill your schedule with new appointments, because we:

  • automate the search and qualification of leads, and we do it at scale
  • automate sending emails in mass
  • deeply personalize every email automatically based on the information that matters to your leads
and we take care of everything from start to finish, so you won't have to do anything.Â 

All you will need to do is close all the new deals.

I know not every company looks for more customers, but I thought this might make sense for you.

If you want to know more, let me know when it's the best time for us to connect for 10 minutes, and I'll show you everything.Â 

While we do it, I will create a custom sample of 100 leads for you, so you can see if you like the results first.

When is it the best time for you?


Best regards,
